http://hangfire.io/
This "DriveTidy" program is amazing. Much better than CCleaner. Reclaimed so much space on C:\ that I thought programs will fail, all good!!
posts.caption: www.fixkb.com
posts.description: A disk cleanup utility that thoroughly scans your computer for unnecessary and invalid files no longer being used by the system freeing up disk space. It removes items that are missed by the built in Windows Disk Cleanup as well as other popular cleaning tools.
